results.content:
So far so good. Sticking with my 4 start rating. The text in the lessons could be larger as well. Even with my good eyes, it is a strain to follow along.  And lastly, I think the formatting from the lecturer could be more consistent, and demonstrate proper indentation 100% of the time. 

That being said, This has been a great refresher course for me, after 10 or so years of not writing code. I'm looking forward to more in depth courses.
results.content_html:
So far so good. Sticking with my 4 start rating. The text in the lessons could be larger as well. Even with my good eyes, it is a strain to follow along. And lastly, I think the formatting from the lecturer could be more consistent, and demonstrate proper indentation 100% of the time.

That being said, This has been a great refresher course for me, after 10 or so years of not writing code. I'm looking forward to more in depth courses.
